title: Shoot the Kuruvi Lyrics Jil Jung Juk Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Shoot the Kuruvi Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Anirudh, Siddharth & “Datho” Radha Ravi
Movie: Jil Jung Juk (2015)

Bimbilika pilla
pee pee
yeah !! yeah !!
this song is for you my love.

Bimbilika pilla
pee pee
kannaadi palicchi
kaattudhu (ha ha)

naan kaadha poththitaa
no no, no, no no
em mummy paavam
sorry ma

Symphonya oru beauty
oru duetkuthaan yenginen
yeah..

ava songu tharala
sangu thandhaa.
feeloda naram.
..tha pochu..
enna paada marandhuten.
vazhoda vettiku kuruma
vaikkudhu vazhaka.
naanga kuruma kuruvinga

shoot the kuruvi
shoot the kuruvi
sorry its my kili
not kuruvi

towser uruvi towser uruvi
got shot my god damn kuruvi
my poor kuruvi
why god why ?

Dear pulla
nee illama
manasula rendu naala novu

yaendi un
inky pinky poky-la
naan thaanaa kaavu.
time irundha en veetu
pakkam vandhu koovu.

adhuvaraikum
I just-u want-u two days
leave-u

varren pulla..
poren pulla.

yours obediently
god shoota kuruvi.

shoot the kuruvi
shoot the kuruvi
sorry its my kili
not kuruvi

towser uruvi towser uruvi
god shot my god damn kuruvi

nee vetti thandha
kutti naan thaan
ayyo calling bella naan
aluththiten.

adhu hell-u vasalu
dooru bellu

ivan vera yaettu
kattayila kadhukulla
kaththuraan.
ketta kovam varudhunga
bye bye ava
sattiyil ennayoda nikkuraan
naanga kuruma kuruvinga

shoot the kuruvi
shoot the kuruvi

not kuruvi

towser uruvi towser uruvi
